publishedfiledetails.title: eco's RP Decor
publishedfiledetails.description:
[h1][b]MOD ID: 741203089[/b][/h1]

[b]Craft decorative furniture and tons of other items for your RP (Role Play) servers![/b]

[h1][b]100% Stackable Mod[/b][/h1]

[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/md97e8895/button1_RP.png][/img]

[h1]All items can be picked up. (Hold use key to pick up.)
If item is destroyed, after placing, it will return the exact amount of materials used to create it.
Engram cost: 0 
Level needed to learn engram: 1
All items have HP[/h1]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/741203089/353916981473816826/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/bstvagw21/Admin_RP.png[/img][/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/670764308/217691032441409625/][img]https://s13.postimg.cc/ww6mh9spj/Mod_RP.png[/img][/url] [url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/741203089/353916584658853322/][img]https://s10.postimg.cc/pof4q0ri1/Bug_Reports.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/741203089/1318836262672778195/][img]https://s9.postimg.cc/fd528jszz/FAQs.png[/img][/url]

[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/g1ylcnmgp/button2_RP.png][/img]

[h1][b]Mod includes:[/b][/h1]

[b]Furniture and Decor Crafting Desk with the following:[/b]
11 Colors of Single Beds (Respawn point)
King Bed (11 color options via radial wheel, 2 laying positions available)
Bunk Bed (11 color options via radial wheel, Shorter cooldown period for respawn, 2 laying positions available)
Coffin Bed (Respawn Point)
Curtains (Hang on wall, can be painted)
10 Furniture Pieces 
35 Dinosaur Head Wall Mounts (Can be Painted)
3 Skull Torches
Bonfire (25 slots, higher hyper/hypo cooks meat faster)
31 War Flags
11 Hanging Flags
11 Pennant Castle Flags
Kitchen Cabinet 
Wooden Stool
Suitcases (Storage)
2 Globes
3 Map Tables (Island, Center, Scorched Earth)
7 Misc Decor items
Wooden Shutter
Metal Balcony
Fireplace Screen
10 Rugs
1 Shag Rug (Can be Painted)
Black Bear Rug (Can be Painted)
Polar Bear Rug (Can be Painted)
Brown Bear Rug (Can be Painted)
Plain Paintable War Flag
3 Paintable Frames
3 Canvas (M,L,XL)
Bathtub
Shower
Bathroom Wall Shelves
Toilet
Rockwell Throne
Ring Box (Found in the Special folder)

[b]Food Tray with the following items:[/b]
12 Food Consumables
12 Decorative Types of Food
Bowl (1 inventory slot)
Mug (1 Inventory slot)
Beer Bottle (1 Inventory slot)
Pitcher
Herb Basket
Empty Tray
Fish Tray
Hanging Herbs
Hanging Pans
Water Basin
Counter (Storage)
Counter with Doors (Storage)
Icebox (Keeps food, milk, darts, etc fresh)
Pantry (120 Inventory Slots, increased spoil timer, can be painted)
Tall Counter/Bar (50 Inventory slots)
Kitchen Jar (3 Inventory Slots, can be used to storage consumables for a short amount of time, can be named)
Water Bucket (Place first to get to snap points for the Sink)
Sink (Decoration or snaps to Water Bucket for running water)
Cooker (Grill and Icebox. Cooks meat 2x faster)
Dye Mixer (Quickly Craft Dye, Snaps to Cooker)
Cooking Pot (Craft Vanilla Medical Brews, Soups, Kibble, etc, Snaps to Cooker)
Recipe Station (Craft Recipes and Faux Medicinal Teas, Snaps to Cooker) [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/741203089/1732087824992827241/]NEW LEARN MORE[/url] 
Mixing Bowl (Craft Bases) [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/741203089/1732087824992827241/]NEW LEARN MORE[/url] 

[b]Community Box with the following items:[/b]
Guestbook (100 Inventory slots)
Bulletin Board (50 Inventory slots)
Outpost (Snap points for ladders and the floor can be built upon)

Bad Box (Can be placed next to an enemy foundation or build. Has 2 inventory slots. Used for RP servers when you have broken into a base and need to leave a note or clue back to your character or tribe)
Journal (Book you can edit and share)

[b]Use promo code eco for 20% off[/b]
I receive NO payment from this company I just really like them :)


[img=https://s10.postimg.cc/g3kn1uni1/RPinstallbutton.png][/img]

[h1][b]Having issues installing or updating a mod?[/b][/h1]
[url=https://www.bluefangsolutions.com/adding-mods-to-your-ark-game-server/]Installing/Updating Mods Tutorial[/url] - Text instructions
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h6MmSoZdRA8]Installing/Updating Mods Tutorial[/url] - Video instructions
[h1][b]MOD ID: 741203089[/b][/h1]

[h1][b]Missing items?[/b][/h1]
If you updated the mod and are missing items then your install is probably corrupt. You must follow the instructions [b][u]specifically[/u][/b] for your server host.

[h1][b]Can't place items or find the Landscape Crafting Table engram?[/b][/h1]
If you can't place an item from this mod then your server probably hasn't updated with the latest version. If you can't find the engram make sure the mod is copied over to the server completely and the mod ID is listed under active mods. 

[img=https://s4.postimg.cc/emzuncswt/rp_Mods.png][/img]
